info.author: Da_Blitz
info.description:
nano-restore
=============
small program to restore the specified file from a nano backup

requires he following line in your .nanorc file

    set backupdir "~/.cache/nano/backups"

the path can be set to whatever value you wish
info.name: nano-restore
info.summary: Simple utility to restore files backed up by nano
info.html_description:
small program to restore the specified file from a nano backup

requires he following line in your .nanorc file

set backupdir “~/.cache/nano/backups”

the path can be set to whatever value you wish
